1.name: Mrs. Lindgren
1.text: All the canaries in the village are singing again.

2.name: Mrs. Lindgren
2.text: I assume you've reunited the lost canary chick to its mother, correct?

3.name: [Pippi]
3.text: Yep! We found her on the other side of a crack in the wall.

4.name: Mrs. Lindgren
4.text: Great! I knew you'd find her!

5.name: Mrs. Lindgren
5.text: Oh, and by the way, the [color]mayor[/color] is itching to see you, [Ninten]...

6.name: Mrs. Lindgren
6.text: [Pippi], go with [Ninten] and help straighten this out.

8.name: [Pippi]
8.text: Come on, [Ninten]! Let's go see the [color]mayor[/color]!
